item.title: IntelliJ IDEA Optimizations
item.description: Please post a comment if you have any additional tips to making IDEA faster. The first thing you want to do is disable all the plugins you are not using. Go to *Preferences& -> Plugins and un-check as many as possible. I unchecked about 80%. Give yourself more memory. I figure if Firefox allows itself to take a gig of my ram then I should treat my IDE a little better.
